CustomField.description: Describes the relation from the primary contact
CustomField.formula: "Is "&TEXT(Type__c)&" voor "& IF( Subsidiary_Relation__r.IsPersonAccount, Subsidiary_Relation__r.FirstName&" "& IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Subsidiary_Relation__r.MiddleName)), Subsidiary_Relation__r.MiddleName&" "&Subsidiary_Relation__r.LastName, Subsidiary_Relation__r.LastName ), Subsidiary_Relation__r.Name )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describes the relation from the primary contact
CustomField.label: Primary Relation Name
